function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete or outdated information from OSHA, CDC, and AGC guidelines may lead to ineffective safety practices.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread among construction workers.","Mitigation":"Regularly update safety protocols based on the latest information from OSHA, CDC, and AGC.","Technologies":"Safety management software for real-time updates and communication of guidelines.","People":"Construction workers, site managers, health and safety professionals.","Owner":"Site managers, health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Qualitative descriptive analysis may not fully and accurately capture the health and safety concerns of construction workers.","Impact":"Failure to address all relevant health and safety concerns, leading to increased risk of COVID-19 spread.","Mitigation":"Augment analysis with quantitative techniques to test hypotheses and identify correlations.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools for statistical analysis and hypothesis testing.","People":"Researchers, health and safety professionals.","Owner":"Research team, health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Effectiveness of the 100 health and safety practices is not fully assessed, leaving room for ineffective practices to be implemented.","Impact":"Potential implementation of ineffective measures, leading to increased risk of COVID-19 spread.","Mitigation":"Conduct a study to assess the effectiveness of current practices and identify additional effective measures.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for evaluating the impact of safety practices.","People":"Health and safety professionals, construction workers.","Owner":"Health and safety department, construction project managers."}]}
